long_description: The Kelty Gunnison 4.2 tent has a simple 2-pole design that makes it easy to set up in any weather, at any time. Its roomy interior and 2 door/2 vestibule design provides all the comfort you need. Gunnison 4.2 includes a handy gear loft to ensure you keep track of those small items that can get lost in the shuffle. For added comfort and convenience, the Gunnison tent fly comes with integrated vents and a welded window. Swivel-hub polesets, color-coded clip construction and Jake's Feet(R) pole anchors make setup logical, fast and secure. DAC Pressfit(R) poles feature a securely fixed, pressed-in ferrule, ensuring the poles will remain strong and reliable. Freestanding design makes it easy to move the tent around to find the ideal spot. Catenary-cut floor/wall design keeps seams off the ground and watertight; taped seams ensure weather protection. Polyester rainfly won't sag when wet; adjustable webbing/side-release buckles attach rainfly to tent. Mesh panels and rainfly vents provide airflow for good moisture evaporation. Kelty Gunnison 4.2 tent features include a welded rainfly window for views outside, internal storage pockets, a gear loft, noiseless zipper pulls and multiple guyout points.
short_description: The Kelty Gunnison 4.2 tent has a simple 2-pole design that makes it easy to set up in any weather, at any time. Its roomy interior and 2 door/2 vestibule design provides all the comfort you need.
